original_title: Queridísimos intelectuales (del placer y del dolor)
overview: Ten Spanish intellectuals (Santiago Carrillo, Fernando Savater, Elena Ochoa, Roman Gubern, Carlos Moya, Luis Gonzalez Seara, Javier Tomeo, Xavier Rubert de Ventós, Antonio Soler, Nuria Amat) philosophize about life, eroticism, humor, irony , suffering, suicide and death.
title: Queridísimos intelectuales (del placer y del dolor)
